sense.def:
The position of someone or something
je kraj, kjer nekdo ali nekaj je.

seg.quote: They tell the time by the position of the sun.
He had shifted position from the front to the back of the room.

sense.def:
Oseba ali stvar je
in position
, kadar je na pravem ali običajnem mestu.

seg.quote: By 8.05 the groups were in position.

sense.def:
Oseba ali stvar je
in a particular position
, kadar sedi, leži, stoji ali je postavljena na določen način.

seg.quote: I helped her to a sitting position.
Hold it in an upright position.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To position something somewhere
pomeni nekaj dati nekam.

seg.quote: Mel positioned his car alongside the foreman's.
The boy positioned himself near the door.

sense.def:
One's position in society
je ugled, ki ga nekdo uživa v družbi.

seg.quote: Women hold a strong position in Aboriginal society.
...people in positions of power and influence.

sense.def:
One's position in a company or organization
je mesto, ki ga nekdo zaseda v podjetju ali organizaciji;

seg.quote: Thorn lost his position as steward.

sense.def:
One's position in a race or competition
je na tekmovanju uvrstitev posameznika med zmagovalce ali mesto med sodelujočimi, ki ga v danem trenutku tekmovanja zaseda.

To be in a particular position
pomeni biti v določenih okoliščinah.

seg.quote: It puts me in a rather difficult position.
You are in the fortunate position of having no responsibilities.

sense.def:
One's position on a particular matter
je mnenje, ki ga ima nekdo o določeni témi;

seg.quote: What is their position on the proposed sale of aircraft?
